\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}

\begin{document}

\def\figScale{0.65} % common scale for all tikz figs in cells (so that dots have the same size)

% stop hyphenation
\hyphenpenalty=10000
\tolerance=1000

\begin{tikzpicture}
\matrix[tablaVertical, % ver def en LEMA-Tikz-IM.sty
        row 1/.append style={nodes={minimum height=9ex}},
        row 2/.append style={nodes={minimum height=22ex}},
        row 3/.append style={nodes={minimum height=22ex}},
        row 4/.append style={nodes={minimum height=17ex}},
        row 5/.append style={nodes={minimum height=17ex}},
        column 1/.append style={nodes={text width = 20ex}},
        column 2/.append style={nodes={text width = 14ex}},
        column 3/.append style={nodes={text width = 15ex}},
        column 4/.append style={nodes={text width = 14ex}},
    ] (myTable) {
        % Header Row 
        \input{enElMercadoAgricola-tab-header.tex}\\
        % contenido tabla para statement y BLM
        \input{enElMercadoAgricola-tab-contenidoStatementyBLM.tex}\\
  };

\end{tikzpicture}


\end{document}
